Title: Suite Française
Writer: Saul Dibb (screenplay), Matt Charman (screenplay), Irène Némirovsky (based on the novel by)
Actors: Michelle Williams, Kristin Scott Thomas, Margot Robbie, Eric Godon
Plot: During the early years of Nazi occupation of France in World War II, romance blooms between Lucile Angellier (Michelle Williams), a French villager, and Bruno von Falk (Matthias Schoenaerts), a German soldier.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 nominations.
